item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2008/12/12/no-one-gets-my-jokes/#comment-2585">Justin Carmony</a>.
Not sure how many people have committed $ to CoWork Utah, but there were probably 50+ at the meet up.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Justin Carmony.

Not sure how many people have committed $ to CoWork Utah, but there were probably 50+ at the meet up.

item.title: By: Mic

item.description: A great idea! In italian the title is "La storia fantastica".
item.content:encoded:
A great idea!
In italian the title is “La storia fantastica”.

item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: Now you know my pain and frustration from the other week!!!!
item.content:encoded: Now you know my pain and frustration from the other week!!!!

item.title: By: Jesse Stay
item.dc:creator: Jesse Stay
item.description:
You were always all the way at the other end of the table, and besides - I know your name :-P
@Roxy - just add the "Utah" Twitter Search to your RSS Feed. That's what I do. Or you can follow my blog and Twitter account and any of those I go to you'll hear about. http://staynalive.com/
item.content:encoded:
You were always all the way at the other end of the table, and besides – I know your name ðŸ˜›

@Roxy – just add the “Utah” Twitter Search to your RSS Feed. That’s what I do. Or you can follow my blog and Twitter account and any of those I go to you’ll hear about. http://staynalive.com/

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description: Who were you hanging around with? Aristotle, Plato, Socrates? MORONS!!!
item.content:encoded: Who were you hanging around with? Aristotle, Plato, Socrates? MORONS!!!

item.title: By: Justin Carmony
item.dc:creator: Justin Carmony
item.description:
That has to be impossible. There is no way that not a single person would get that joke..... They must have just seen a lot of text and not read it.
How many people are in this CoWork Utah thing?
item.content:encoded:
That has to be impossible. There is no way that not a single person would get that joke….. They must have just seen a lot of text and not read it.

How many people are in this CoWork Utah thing?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2008/12/12/no-one-gets-my-jokes/#comment-2583">Brian</a>.
You keep using that word, I do not think it means what you think it means.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Brian.

You keep using that word, I do not think it means what you think it means.

item.title: By: Brian

item.description: No one got the joke? ... "That's INCONCEIVABLE!" ;)
item.content:encoded: No one got the joke? … “That’s INCONCEIVABLE!” ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Alex

item.description: No one got that? You should make the next meeting a screening of TPB!
item.content:encoded: No one got that? You should make the next meeting a screening of TPB!
